---
title: "R Pirate YaRrr"
---


```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
install.packages("yarrr")
library("yarrr")
```


```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
pirateplot(formula = weight ~ Time,
data = ChickWeight,
pal = "xmen")
```


```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
yarrr::pirateplot(formula = weight ~ Diet,
                  data = ChickWeight)
```
